author: J.K. Rowling
review: A thrilling continuation of the Harry Potter series, filled with magical adventures and unexpected twists.

author: George Orwell
review: An alarming portrayal of a dystopian society, raising poignant questions about the nature of authority and freedom.

author: Harper Lee
review: A timeless masterpiece exploring themes of racial injustice and moral growth, with memorable characters and a powerful narrative.

author: Stephen Hawking
review: An illuminating journey through the cosmos, offering profound insights into the universe's mysteries and scientific principles.

author: Agatha Christie
review: A captivating murder mystery with ingenious plot twists and a brilliant detective at its heart.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: A monumental work of fantasy literature, enchanting readers with its rich world-building and timeless storytelling.
